languages.text: Находится на мостике далее стало невозможно. Еще немного, и вздохи просто свели бы людей с ума. Лорд-капитан скомандовал{mf||а} отступление.
It was impossible to stay on the bridge after that. Any longer and the sighs would have driven the team insane. The Lord Captain gave the order to retreat to the shuttle.
languages.original_text: Находится на мостике далее стало невозможно. Еще немного, и вздохи просто свели бы людей с ума. Лорд-капитан скомандовал{mf||а} отступление.

traits.locale_text: It was impossible to stay on the bridge after that. Any longer and the sighs would have driven the team insane. The Lord Captain gave the order to retreat to the shuttle.
It was impossible to stay on the bridge after that. Any longer and the sighs would have driven the team insane. The Lord Captain gave the order to retreat to the shuttle.
It was impossible to stay on the bridge after that. Any longer and the sighs would have driven the team insane. The Lord Captain gave the order to retreat to the shuttle.
It was impossible to stay on the bridge after that. Any longer and the sighs would have driven the team insane. The Lord Captain gave the order to retreat to the shuttle.

languages.text: Era imposible permanecer en el puente después de eso. Un momento más y los suspiros habrían hecho enloquecer al equipo. {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} dio la orden de retirarse a la lanzadera.
languages.original_text: It was impossible to stay on the bridge after that. Any longer and the sighs would have driven the team insane. The Lord Captain gave the order to retreat to the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: Era imposible permanecer en el puente después de eso. Un momento más y los suspiros habrían hecho enloquecer al equipo. {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} dio la orden de retirarse a la lanzadera.

languages.text: 队员们已经不可能继续停留在舰桥上了。如果继续留在这里，叹息声可能会把队员们全都逼疯。舰长大人下达了撤退命令，让所有人都返回穿梭机。
languages.original_text: It was impossible to stay on the bridge after that. Any longer and the sighs would have driven the team insane. The Lord Captain gave the order to retreat to the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: 队员们已经不可能继续停留在舰桥上了。如果继续留在这里，叹息声可能会把队员们全都逼疯。舰长大人下达了撤退命令，让所有人都返回穿梭机。

languages.text: その後、ブリッジに留まることはできなくなった。これ以上いれば、ため息がチームを狂わせてしまうだろう。ロード・キャプテンは、シャトルに退却せよと命令を出した。
languages.original_text: It was impossible to stay on the bridge after that. Any longer and the sighs would have driven the team insane. The Lord Captain gave the order to retreat to the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: その後、ブリッジに留まることはできなくなった。これ以上いれば、ため息がチームを狂わせてしまうだろう。ロード・キャプテンは、シャトルに退却せよと命令を出した。

languages.text: Anschließend war es unmöglich, noch länger auf der Brücke zu verweilen. Das Seufzen hätte das Team in den Wahnsinn getrieben. Der Lord Captain erteilte den Befehl, sich zum Shuttle zurückzuziehen.
languages.original_text: It was impossible to stay on the bridge after that. Any longer and the sighs would have driven the team insane. The Lord Captain gave the order to retreat to the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: Anschließend war es unmöglich, noch länger auf der Brücke zu verweilen. Das Seufzen hätte das Team in den Wahnsinn getrieben. Der Lord Captain erteilte den Befehl, sich zum Shuttle zurückzuziehen.

languages.text: Il était impossible de rester sur la passerelle après cela. Les soupirs désincarnés auraient fini par faire perdre la raison à toute l'équipe. {name} donna l'ordre de retourner à la navette.
languages.original_text: It was impossible to stay on the bridge after that. Any longer and the sighs would have driven the team insane. The Lord Captain gave the order to retreat to the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: Il était impossible de rester sur la passerelle après cela. Les soupirs désincarnés auraient fini par faire perdre la raison à toute l'équipe. {name} donna l'ordre de retourner à la navette.

languages.text: Köprüde kalmak imkânsızdı. İç çekiş sesleri, takımı deliliğin eşiğine sürüklüyordu. Lord Kaptan, mekiğe dönüş emrini verdi.
languages.original_text: It was impossible to stay on the bridge after that. Any longer and the sighs would have driven the team insane. The Lord Captain gave the order to retreat to the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: Köprüde kalmak imkânsızdı. İç çekiş sesleri, takımı deliliğin eşiğine sürüklüyordu. Lord Kaptan, mekiğe dönüş emrini verdi.
